column4: hi, I'm having trouble with getting java working in firefox, for some unknown reason none flavor (gij, sun java, open java) is being recognized by firefox (there is no error, firefox simple thinks I dont have any jre), is there something I'm missing, there is any configuration necessary beside download java and the accomplish java plugin ? thks
but yet firefox didnt recognized I have a jre
you need the plugin also, not 'just' the jre... it's in contrib i 'think'
